item.title: Studies Suggests That Social Media Creates A Real Imaginary Audience
item.description: Researchers are finding that high use of social media among young adults can impact developmental constructs, such as the imaginary audience.

item.title: New Samsung Leak Reveals Surprise Galaxy S26 Ultra Camera Downgrade
item.description: Two top leakers disagree on the Galaxy S26 Ultra’s camera. One says 3x telephoto upgrades. The other says it’s a downgrade. Here’s what we know.
